alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Natchitoches and northeastern Sabine Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Natchitoches to 10 miles west of Lena to near Flatwoods. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Montgomery, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Robeline, Cloutierville, Melrose, Bellwood, Chopin, St. Maurice, Flora, Cypress, Bermuda, Gorum and Hagewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
